Sure, here are some popular smart water bottle brands and models that you can consider for tracking your water intake during workouts:

1. HidrateSpark: The HidrateSpark 3 smart water bottle uses Bluetooth technology and an app to track your water intake and suggests how much water you should drink based on your fitness goals and sweat rate. 2. Thermos Smart Lid: Thermos Smart Lid is a rechargeable Bluetooth-enabled lid that fits on any standard water bottle. It tracks your water intake and syncs with Fitbit and Apple Health. 3. HydraCoach: The HydraCoach Intelligent Water Bottle calculates your personal hydration needs based on your weight, duration of activity, and sweat rate. It also keeps track of your water intake, and you can set reminders to drink more water. 4. AquaGenie: AquaGenie is a smart water bottle that tracks your water intake, syncs with an app to provide personalized hydration goals based on your daily activity, and offers glowing reminders to drink water. 5. Ozmo Active: The Ozmo Active smart water bottle tracks both water and coffee consumption, syncs with Fitbit and Apple Health, offers personalized hydration goals, and provides real-time feedback to help you stay hydrated. These are just a few examples, so you can do some research to see which one fits your needs and budget the best.
